name: Heartbeat Grave
description:
Heartbeat Grave is a 2D action adventure game for PC and WebGL. Players will explore different ancient sites and find real keys and doors to obtain relics. On the way of exploration, players must use reaction and manipulation to avoid all traps.

If you'd like to play the game in browser, you can check out the creators' game page here: https://jing-mengmeng.itch.io/heartbeat-grave.
